title: Journey DVD-Rip Collection [4 Rips] (Xvid, MP3 @320kbps)

*(2001) Journey 2001

	Resolution.....: 640x480 (4:3)

	Recorded from a concert in December 2000 in Las Vegas, Nevada, and features the then-new lead vocalist Steve Augeri (who was with Journey from 1998 to 2006).

*(2003) Greatest Hits 1978-1997

	Resolution.....: 640x480 (4:3)

	Audio..........: MP3 @320kbps
	Total Size.....: 968MB

	A collection of Journey music videos and live performances; 10 music videos, 8 live performances (5 from the 1981 Escape Tour, and 3 from the 1986 Raised on Radio tour).

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

*(2005) Live in Houston 1981 - Escape Tour

	Resolution.....: 640x480 (4:3)

	Recorded from a concert on November 6th, 1981, in Houston, Texas. Included is the main concert, as well as bonus features from the DVD (see above).

*(2008) Revelation

	Resolution.....: 720x416
	Duration.......: 1:02:59
	Video..........: Xvid (MPEG-4) @1790kbps
	Audio..........: MP3 @320kbps
	Total Size.....: 829MB

	Recorded from a concert on March 8th, 2008, in Las Vegas, Nevada, and features new lead vocalist Arnel Pineda (who has been with Journey since February of 2008). The DVD was included with the 2008 album Revelation, which is Journey's first album with Arnel Pineda.
